abstract: The technology heavyweights joined forces at the Mobile World Congress event in Barcelona to unveil MeeGo, a software platform designed to run on just about any computing device.
snippet: The technology heavyweights joined forces at the Mobile World Congress event in Barcelona to unveil MeeGo, a software platform designed to run on just about any computing device.
lead_paragraph: BARCELONA, Spain — If the wildest dreams of Intel and Nokia come true, we’ll be talking about the market-shaping might of NokTel for years to come.

headline.main: Intel and Nokia Team Up on Mobile Software
